name: Open Mat Adventures!
description:
This game is free for everyone. If you think it's worth the cost of a cup of coffee, why not tip the creator a few bucks.

Controls on Keyboard:

Z - A Button

X - B button

Shift - Select Button

ENTER - Start Button

Directional keys to move.

If you find any bugs or have had a great time, comment below! Or screenshot anything and send to @bainstore
